Bahnar: 'Moi rok teh asong kơ Juđa, đơ̆ng hơdral gah hơlĕch truh tơ hơdral gah bơmơ̆t, noh teh lu iĕm athei 'măn lê̆ pha, wơ̆l sư 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt tor sư dang ăi teh asong kơ lu adrĕch đơ̆ng hơdral gah hơlĕch truh tơ hơdral gah bơmơ̆t Anih Hnam Akŭm oei tŏk-bŏk tơ lăm teh 'nâu.

English: “The district that you shall set apart for the LORD shall be twenty-five thousand cubits in length and ten thousand in width.
Bahnar: Teh mă lu iĕm pơyơ̆r kơ Kră Yang tor 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt păng wơ̆l 'bar-jĭt rơbâu.

English: To these—to the priests—the holy district shall belong: on the north twenty-five thousand cubits in length, on the west ten thousand in width, on the east ten thousand in width, and on the south twenty-five thousand in length. The sanctuary of the LORD shall be in the center.
Bahnar: 'Nâu teh 'lơ̆ng rơgoh mă đei pơyơ̆r 'măn lê̆ pha ăn kơ lu 'bok soi tor sư gah yă-nơ̆m đei 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt, wơ̆l gah bơmơ̆t, mơjĭt-rơbâu hơgăt wơ̆l gah hơlĕch mơjĭt-rơbâu hơgăt, tor gah gơal đei 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt; Hnam Akŭm Kră Yang gô oei tơ lăm tŏk-bŏk teh âu.

English: It shall be for the priests of the sons of Zadok, who are sanctified, who have kept My charge, who did not go astray when the children of Israel went astray, as the Levites went astray.
Bahnar: Teh 'nâu ăn kơ lu 'bok soi klah lê̆, 'lơ̆ng rơgoh ăn kơ lu adrĕch Sađŏk, lu bơngai mă jang tơnăp bơ̆jang kơ Inh, ưh kơ đei tơklah weh đơ̆ng inh thoi lu adrĕch Lêwi đei tơklah, kơplah lu adrĕch adrung Isơrael weh tơklah đơ̆ng inh.

English: And this district of land that is set apart shall be to them a thing most holy by the border of the Levites.
Bahnar: 'Nâu teh gĭt ăn kơ lu sư đơ̆ng teh 'lơ̆ng rơgoh tơpă, teh mă lu đe 'măn lê̆ 'bơ̆t cheng tơtil hơdral teh lu bơngai Lêwi.

English: “Opposite the border of the priests, the Levites shall have an area twenty-five thousand cubits in length and ten thousand in width; its entire length shall be twenty-five thousand and its width ten thousand.
Bahnar: Teh asong lu bơngai Lêwi pơrok kiơ̆ kơ teh asong kơ lu 'bok soi, 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu tor păng mơjĭt-rơbâu wơ̆l; tor sư 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt, wơ̆l sư mơjĭt-rơbâu hơgăt.

English: And they shall not sell or exchange any of it; they may not alienate this best part of the land, for it is holy to the LORD.
Bahnar: Teh 'nâu lu sư ưh kơ gơh tĕch, ưh kơ gơh tơplih, dah mă chă ăn kơ đe chă ala iŏk. Yua kơ teh âu klah lê̆ 'lơ̆ng rơgoh pơyơ̆r kơ Kră Yang.

English: “The five thousand cubits in width that remain, along the edge of the twenty-five thousand, shall be for general use by the city, for dwellings and common-land; and the city shall be in the center.
Bahnar: Teh oei wơ̆l pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt păng tor 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt tor, noh 'măn lê̆ wă yua lăm pơlei tih, pơm hnam oei gah 'nguaih rong 'nhĕt, pơm pơlei tih lăm tŏk-bŏk.

English: These shall be its measurements: the north side four thousand five hundred cubits, the south side four thousand five hundred, the east side four thousand five hundred, and the west side four thousand five hundred.
Bahnar: Să iĕ pơlei tih thoi âu: Gah yă-nơ̆m puăn-rơbâu pơđăm-hrĕng hơgăt, gah gơal puăn-rơbâu pơđăm-hrĕng hlok, gah hơlĕch puăn-rơbâu pơđăm hơgăt gah bơmơ̆t puăn-rơbâu pơđăm-hrĕng hlok.

English: The common-land of the city shall be: to the north two hundred and fifty cubits, to the south two hundred and fifty, to the east two hundred and fifty, and to the west two hundred and fifty.
Bahnar: Teh tơmăn 'nhĕt pơlei tih, gah yă-nơ̆m đei 'bar-hrĕng pơđăm-jĭt hơgăt, gah gơal 'bar-hrĕng pơđăm-jĭt hlok gah hơlĕch 'bar-hrĕng pơđăm-jĭt hơgăt păng gah bơmơ̆t 'bar-hrĕng pơđăm-jĭt hơgăt.

English: The rest of the length, alongside the district of the holy section, shall be ten thousand cubits to the east and ten thousand to the west. It shall be adjacent to the district of the holy section, and its produce shall be food for the workers of the city.
Bahnar: Teh mă oei đei tơklă tơtil kơ teh 'lơ̆ng rơgoh gah hơlĕch mơjĭt-rơbâu hơgăt păng gah bơmơ̆t mơjĭt-rơbâu hơgăt, tơ bưh hăm teh 'lơ̆ng rơgoh, lu plei sa, phe 'ba lăm teh âu gô ăn kơ lu bơngai bơ̆jang lăm pơlei tih sa.

English: The workers of the city, from all the tribes of Israel, shall cultivate it.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mă bơ̆jang lăm pơlei tih, đơ̆ng rim adrĕch Isơrael gô choh pơtăm lăm teh âu.

English: The entire district shall be twenty-five thousand cubits by twenty-five thousand cubits, foursquare. You shall set apart the holy district with the property of the city.
Bahnar: Lu iĕm athei 'măn lê̆ minh 'bôt teh dơ'bŭng 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt kơ minh pah pơm teh 'lơ̆ng rơgoh hăm teh pơlei tih.

English: “The rest shall belong to the prince, on one side and on the other of the holy district and of the city’s property, next to the twenty-five thousand cubits of the holy district as far as the eastern border, and westward next to the twenty-five thousand as far as the western border, adjacent to the tribal portions; it shall belong to the prince. It shall be the holy district, and the sanctuary of the temple shall be in the center.
Bahnar: Teh mă oei đei rok 'bar pah teh 'lơ̆ng rơgoh păng teh jang sa lu bơngai oei lăm pơlei tih. 'Măn kơ yŏng pơgơ̆r. Teh noh đơ̆ng gah hơlĕch; kơ teh anih 'lơ̆ng rơgoh păng teh pơlei tih mă tor 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt truh tơ hơdral char Isơrael gah hơlĕch păng đơ̆ng gah bơmơ̆t kơ teh anih 'lơ̆ng rơgoh păng teh pơlei tih mă tor 'bar-jĭt pơđăm-rơbâu hơgăt truh tơ hơdral char Isơrael gah bơmơ̆t. 'Moi rok kiơ̆ teh asong kơ lu adrĕch. Teh 'lơ̆ng rơgoh păng hnam akŭm oei lăm tŏk-bŏk teh noh.

English: Moreover, apart from the possession of the Levites and the possession of the city which are in the midst of what belongs to the prince, the area between the border of Judah and the border of Benjamin shall belong to the prince.
Bahnar: Thoi ei teh jang sa kơ lu bơngai Lêwi păng teh jang sa pơlei tih, gô oei tơ lăm tŏk-bŏk teh yŏng pơgơ̆r. Teh asong yŏng pơgơ̆r oei tơ lăm tŏk-bŏk sơlam kơ teh bre Juđa hăm Bênjamin.

English: “As for the rest of the tribes, from the east side to the west, Benjamin shall have one section
Bahnar: Gah adrĕch mă oei đei Bênjamin asong minh pah đơ̆ng gah hơlĕch truh tơ gah bơmơ̆t.

English: by the border of Benjamin, from the east side to the west, Simeon shall have one section
Bahnar: 'Moi rok hơdral teh Bênjamin, đơ̆ng gah hơlĕch truh tơ gah bơmơ̆t, noh teh asong kơ Simêôn.

English: by the border of Simeon, from the east side to the west, Issachar shall have one section
Bahnar: 'Moi rok hơdral teh Simêôn, đơ̆ng gah hơlĕch truh tơ gah bơmơ̆t, noh teh asong kơ Isakar

English: by the border of Issachar, from the east side to the west, Zebulun shall have one section
Bahnar: 'Moi rok hơdral teh Isakar, đơ̆ng gah hơlĕch truh tơ gah bơmơ̆t, noh teh asong ăn kơ Sabulôn.

English: by the border of Zebulun, from the east side to the west, Gad shall have one section
Bahnar: 'Moi rok hơdral teh Sabulôn, đơ̆ng gah hơlĕch truh tơ gah bơmơ̆t, noh teh asong ăn kơ Gat.

English: by the border of Gad, on the south side, toward the South, the border shall be from Tamar to the waters of Meribah by Kadesh, along the brook to the Great Sea.
Bahnar: Hơdral teh Gat tơ gah gơal, Iŏk đơ̆ng Thamar truh tơ lu Đak Mêriba, Kades rok Thong Đak Êyiptơ dĭng truh tơ Đak Dơsĭ Tih.

English: This is the land which you shall divide by lot as an inheritance among the tribes of Israel, and these are their portions,” says the Lord GOD.
Bahnar: 'Nâu boih teh lu iĕm gô hlang lăng asong ăn kơ adrĕch bơngai Isơrael wă jang sa; noh boih teh asong ăn kơ lu sư, Kră Yang khan.

English: “These are the exits of the city. On the north side, measuring four thousand five hundred cubits
Bahnar: 'Nâu boih lu trong pơlei tih mơ̆t lĕch: Tơ gah yă-nơ̆m đei pơtŏ, puăn-rơbâu pơđăm-hrĕng hơgăt.

English: (the gates of the city shall be named after the tribes of Israel), the three gates northward: one gate for Reuben, one gate for Judah, and one gate for Levi
Bahnar: Lu 'măng jang pơlei krao anăn kiơ̆ kơ anăn adrĕch Isơrael pêng tŏ 'măng jang gah yă-nơ̆m noh krao: 'Măng jang Rubên, 'măng jang Juđa păng 'măng jang Lêwi.

English: on the east side, four thousand five hundred cubits, three gates: one gate for Joseph, one gate for Benjamin, and one gate for Dan
Bahnar: Tơ gah hơlĕch, đei pơtŏ puăn-rơbâu pơđăm-hrĕng hơgăt, đei pêng tŏ 'măng jang krao: 'Măng jang Jôsep; 'măng jang Bênjamin; păng 'măng Đan.

English: on the south side, measuring four thousand five hundred cubits, three gates: one gate for Simeon, one gate for Issachar, and one gate for Zebulun
Bahnar: Păng tơ gah gơal đei pơtŏ puăn-rơbâu pơđăm-hrĕng hlok, đei pêng tŏ 'măng jang krao: 'Măng jang Simêôn, 'măng jang Isakar păng 'măng jang Sabulôn.

English: on the west side, four thousand five hundred cubits with their three gates: one gate for Gad, one gate for Asher, and one gate for Naphtali.
Bahnar: Păng tơ gah bơmơ̆t đei pơtŏ, puăn-rơbâu pơđăm-hrĕng hơgăt đei pêng tŏ 'măng jang krao: 'Măng jang Gat, 'măng jang Ase, păng 'măng jang Neptali.

English: All the way around shall be eighteen thousand cubits; and the name of the city from that day shall be: THE LORD IS THERE.”
Bahnar: Pơtŏ jum dăr kơ pơlei tih đei mơjĭt-tơhngam rơbâu hơgăt. Đơ̆ng năr noh krao anăn pơlei tih âu: Kră Yang oei lăm noh.”
